Name: Shell Bash
Description: Deal 2 damage. Deal 4 damage instead if you are the Turtle's partner.

Name: Wait Patiently
Description:
Remove 2 time counters.
Draw a card.

Name: Retreat
Description: Discard a card. If you do, skip the Enemies Attack and Time Passes steps of the night phase this turn.

Name: Submerge
Description:
Gain 2 vitality.
Draw an action or resource on the field.

Name: Dabble
Description:
Deal 1 damage.
Remove 2 time counters.
Gain 3 vitality.
